duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform downstream purification including chromatography using AKTA, ultrafiltration/diafiltration, viral inactivation, and viral filtration.
Apply knowledge of cGMPs to process development and scale-up.
Demonstrate critical thinking, organizational skills, and attention to detail.
Collaborate effectively in a team environment.
Meet physical demands such as lifting up to 50 Lbs. and standing for long periods.
Work under pressure and meet deadlines.

education_certification.credential: B.S. in Chemical/Biochemical Engineering, Biotechnology, Biochemistry or related biologics field with 0-3 years of industry experience.
